Interface VTimezoneGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TzUrlDotOrgGenerator

    public interface VTimezoneGenerator
    Generates iCalendar VTimezone components from Java TimeZone objects.
    Author:
    Michael Angstadt

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VTimezone generate(TimeZone timezone)
      Generates an iCalendar VTimezone components from a Java TimeZone object.
